thread.title: An oasis in the midst of madness
thread.title_full: An oasis in the midst of madness - Review of Hyatt Centric Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Marcus F
title: An oasis in the midst of madness
text:
This hotel is 200m away from Time Square and 350m away from the subway. We stayed in a deluxe suite, room 5001 on the 50th floor and the views to Times Square and the surrounds are spectacular. Our room had a large bathroom with separate lounge to the bedroom.On the 54th floor is the bar with an open balcony to enjoy the night lights with a great atmosphere. The staff were fantastic and it would be the hotel that we would stay in again in New York.
Room Tip: Rooms above the 45th floor have great views, research your room before purchasing. New York is noisy... See more room tips
